com.hazelcast.map.impl.nearcache

Class StaleReadPreventerNearCacheWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.map.impl.nearcache.StaleReadPreventerNearCacheWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NearCache

    public final class StaleReadPreventerNearCacheWrapper
extends Object
implements NearCache
    Guards a NearCache against stale reads by using KeyStateMarker
    See Also:
    KeyStateMarker
